♪ Emancipate yourself From mental slavery ♪
Damn. That was awesome. That was beautiful.
What'd you think?
It's good. I had trouble following the story of the song,
translation.fr: C'est bien. J'ai eu du mal à suivre les paroles,

translation.en: but it was good. It was good.
- How long you been playing for? - Two years.
translation.fr: - Tu joues depuis quand ? - Deux ans.

translation.en: Two years. Wow, I had no idea.
- - Ah, hold up.
- It's Caroline. Dang. Hold on. -
- Everything all right? - It's fine.
Tell me about this girl you're dating.
- You go to the same school? - No. She's already in middle school.
translation.fr: Vous êtes dans la même école ? Non, elle est au collège.

translation.en: Oh, middle school. Uh- oh, look out. Jaden's got himself an older woman.
translation.fr: Au collège. Attention. Jaden s'est trouvé une femme mûre.

translation.en: No. Jaden got held back a year.
It's nothing to be ashamed of, right, son? It's all good.
translation.fr: Y a pas de honte à avoir. C'est rien du tout.

translation.en: Did I tell you I got a girlfriend?
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit que j'avais une copine ?

translation.en: Yes, I do. Her name's Kimberly.
I got a photograph of her here.
There she is. Ninety- eight pounds.
I call her my little spinner. Wanna know why?
translation.fr: Je la surnomme mon assiette chinoise.

translation.en: Why?
Because I set her up on the tip of my pecker
translation.fr: Je la pose sur mon manche

translation.en: and spin her around like a spinning top.
translation.fr: et je la fais tourner à fond.

translation.en: All right, Don. That's enough.
Oh, God, love her.
After this trip, me and her are gonna visit her folks in Kentucky. Phew.
translation.fr: Après ça, on ira voir sa famille dans le Kentucky.

translation.en: They got it figured out. They got this beautiful land.
translation.fr: Ils se la coulent douce. Une belle propriété.

translation.en: Great big farm. All they do is sit around watching TV.
translation.fr: Une grande ferme. Ils passent leur temps devant la télé.

translation.en: Don't they have a farm to run?
I guess. I ain't never seen them do it, though.
All I see them do is watch television.
translation.fr: Ils font que mater la télé.

translation.en: That is gangster.
Sounds kind of boring to me.
Me and Kimberly like it, so it's not that boring to me.
translation.fr: Kimber et moi, on adore, et ça me va très bien.

translation.en: How about you, Dad? You got a girlfriend?
translation.fr: Et toi, papa ? T'as une copine ?

translation.en: Who, Buck? The only tail your dad is chasing is whitetail.
translation.fr: Qui ça, Buck ? Il ne chasse qu'une chose : le cerf.

translation.en: Yeah. That's right.
Maybe you should start dating again.
translation.fr: Tu devrais te chercher une copine.

translation.en: No, no, no. I'm all right as is. I'm doing just fine.
translation.fr: Non. Je suis content comme ça. Ça me va très bien.

translation.en: Probably be good for you.
translation.fr: Ça te ferait peut-être du bien.

translation.en: Seems like Mom is moving on. Her and Greg are talking about getting married.
translation.fr: Maman refait sa vie, elle. Avec Greg, ils parlent de se marier.

translation.en: They're talking about what?
He hasn't officially asked her yet, but she knows it's coming.
translation.fr: Il n'a pas fait sa demande, mais elle s'y attend.

translation.en: They talk about it all the time.
Shoot. That's ridiculous.
The ink on the divorce is barely even dry.
translation.fr: On vient à peine de divorcer.

translation.en: It has been two years, Buck.
What are you, a human calendar?
Mr. Trapper Keeper? I know how long it's been.
translation.fr: M. L'agenda ? Je suis au courant.

translation.en: God! Shoot. I hate selfish people!
translation.fr: Bon sang ! Je hais les égoïstes !

translation.en: I'll give it to him, though.
Greg told me some of his ideas for when he proposes.
translation.fr: Greg m'a parlé des idées qu'il a pour sa demande.

translation.en: Man, that dude has a great imagination.
He was talking about all these crazy things like skydiving.
translation.fr: Il pensait à un saut en parachute.

translation.en: Where you going?
I'm gonna go take a leak.
Dang.
What were you thinking?
You know better than to pull a stunt like this.
You could have hurt yourself.
Sorry. Dang!
What is going on in your mind?
I just wanted to ride and y'all were asleep.
translation.fr: Je voulais faire un tour, et vous dormiez.

translation.en: You realize I have to pay for that four- wheeler now?
translation.fr: T'es au courant que je vais devoir payer ?

translation.en: - You realize how much they cost? -
Why are you recording?
This isn't part of the narrative.
I figured it might make a good mid- point crisis--
Shut the camera off.
Trying to have a moment with my son. Remove yourself.
translation.fr: Je veux discuter avec mon fils. Bouge.

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
This sucks. If you let me drive, then we wouldn't be in this predicament.
translation.fr: Ça craint. Si tu me laissais conduire, on n'en serait pas là.

translation.en: You shouldn't have taken out the four- wheeler without permission.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas à prendre le quad sans ma permission.

translation.en: Fine. I'm the devil. I'm a terrible person.
translation.fr: D'accord. Ça fait de moi un criminel.

translation.en: - Who are you calling? - Nobody.
Dang, I'm making a video for my vlog.
translation.fr: Je fais une vidéo pour mon vlog.

translation.en: What's up? This is Jaden running around here,
hunting in the woods with my dad.
Sucks.
Leave me some comments if you hate hunting, too.
translation.fr: Lâchez vos com' si vous détestez la chasse.

translation.en: Give it.
What are you doing?
I told you one too many times to stay off the phone.
translation.fr: Je t'ai dit de lâcher ton téléphone.

translation.en: But that's my private property.
I'm keeping this until the end of the trip.
translation.fr: Je le garde jusqu'à la fin.

translation.en: For the next few days, you have to go without it.
What about Caroline?
The world isn't gonna end if you can't call your girlfriend for three days.
translation.fr: C'est pas la fin du monde si tu lui causes pas pendant trois jours.

translation.en: But we're each other's support system.
The cell phone is mine. Topic closed.
You're ruining my life and you don't even care.
translation.fr: Tu me pourris la vie et tu t'en fiches.

translation.en: Maybe I'm ruining your life 'cause you're being a damn idiot.
translation.fr: Peut-être parce que tu te conduis en idiot.

translation.en: Don't call me an idiot!
- Okay. - Take it back.
translation.fr: - D'accord. - Retire ce que t'as dit.

translation.en: I take it back. It's not like I meant it.
translation.fr: Je retire. Je voulais pas dire ça.

translation.en: Let's forget about it.
Now what about that non- typical we saw yesterday?
How'd you like to bag that son of a gun, huh?
translation.fr: Ça te dirait de buter cette bête ?

translation.en: Come on, we're hunting. Let's have fun.
translation.fr: C'est une partie de chasse. Il faut s'amuser.

translation.en: I can't stand you sometimes.
I see you peeking out from behind that tree.
translation.fr: Je te vois derrière ton arbre.

translation.en: This is not going in the cut.
After experiencing some technical difficulties
with one of our four- wheelers,
we decided to go on foot.
translation.fr: on a décidé de continuer à pied.

translation.en: Nothing was gonna keep Jaden and me from catching that monster non- typical.
translation.fr: Rien n'empêchera Jaden et moi d'attraper ce spécimen monstrueux.

translation.en: When things don't go right, a true hunter straps on his boots and marches on.
translation.fr: Quand ça ne va pas, un bon chasseur met ses bottes et avance.

translation.en: Just when we thought we'd lost the trail,
translation.fr: On croyait avoir perdu sa trace,

translation.en: I noticed a whole mess of tracks by the river.
translation.fr: mais j'ai vu des empreintes près de la rivière.

translation.en: This was a good sign.
It looked like a well- traveled doe trail, and like every hunter knows,
translation.fr: C'était la trace d'une biche, et comme tout chasseur sait,

translation.en: where there's a doe, a buck is not far behind.
translation.fr: quand il y a une biche, il y a un cerf.

translation.en: I showed Jaden how the doe trail followed up the river.
translation.fr: J'ai montré à Jaden qu'elle remontait la rivière.

translation.en: Our non- typical was leading us even deeper into the mountains,
translation.fr: Notre spécimen nous menait plus loin encore dans la forêt,

translation.en: miles away from human contact.
translation.fr: à des kilomètres de la civilisation.

translation.en: Almost as if it was calling us.
Just like life, hunting comes with no guarantees.
translation.fr: À la chasse comme dans la vie, rien n'est garanti.

translation.en: But I don't usually have a problem finding the big deer,
translation.fr: Mais je finis toujours par trouver mon cerf,

translation.en: especially with that old Sniper 2000 stuff I use.
translation.fr: surtout avec ce bon vieux Sniper 2000.

translation.en: That's what I'm talking about.
It's like he doesn't even care about catching this deer.
translation.fr: Il n'en a rien à faire du cerf.

translation.en: This trip was supposed to be a way for us to bond.
translation.fr: On est censés créer des liens.

translation.en: Yeah, well, it doesn't look like that's happening.
- Jesus, Don. - What? I'm agreeing with you.
translation.fr: - Merde, Don. - Quoi ? Je suis d'accord.

translation.en: It doesn't look like it's happening.
- Yeah, well, stop. - Okay. Copy that.
I was hoping to discuss something with you, if you don't mind.
translation.fr: Je voulais te parler d'un truc, si ça te dérange pas.

translation.en: Yeah, what?
Well, I was thinking maybe after this trip I go ahead and take a little time off.
translation.fr: Après cette escapade, je pensais faire une pause.

translation.en: What? Time off?
Yeah, you know, I told you about Kimberly's parents' farm.
translation.fr: Je t'ai parlé de la ferme des parents de Kimberly.

translation.en: We were thinking maybe going up there,
spend a little time, uh, hang out there. See how it fits us.
translation.fr: et y passer un peu de bon temps. Voir si c'est fait pour nous.

translation.en: But we got Washington next month.
translation.fr: On a Washington le mois prochain.

translation.en: That's the thing. I was thinking maybe you go up alone and I sit this one out.
translation.fr: Oui. Et je me disais que tu pourrais y aller tout seul.

translation.en: But we gotta shoot Buck Ferguson Takes On the Great Northwest.
translation.fr: On doit tourner Buck Ferguson s'attaque au grand Nord-Ouest.

translation.en: Well, Buck, to be honest,
Kimberly's getting sick of me leaving all the time.
translation.fr: Kimberly en a ras le bol que je sois jamais là.

translation.en: She's throwing around the R word.
translation.fr: Il y a un mot qu'elle répète souvent.

translation.en: What's that word?
Retirement. She thinks I should be retiring.
I can't believe you're choosing now to bring this up.
translation.fr: Et tu choisis ce moment pour me dire ça.

translation.en: Don't you think I got enough to worry about with Jaden?
translation.fr: Jaden me cause assez de souci, non ?

translation.en: Yeah, of course I do.
Look, you and me have done things the world is gonna remember.
translation.fr: Ensemble, on a fait des exploits qui passeront à la postérité.

translation.en: I've done them, but you videotaped me doing them.
translation.fr: C'est moi qui les ai faits, mais tu m'as filmé.

translation.en: You wanna throw that all away?
No, Buck. I never said I want to throw them away. I...
translation.fr: Non, Buck. C'est pas ce que j'ai dit...

translation.en: This isn't really that thought out of an idea.
It was just something she was pushing on me.
translation.fr: Elle a juste évoqué la chose.

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I can't allow it.
Your dream of watching TV all day long is gonna have to wait.
translation.fr: Ton rêve de rester calé devant la télé devra attendre.

translation.en: I need all hands on deck right now.
Yeah. No. Of course you do.
We're in the middle of it, so, yeah.
Maybe we can agree to discuss this at a later date.
translation.fr: Mais on pourrait en reparler plus tard.

translation.en: - How about that? - Yeah. I don't know, Don.
translation.fr: - T'en dis quoi ? - Je sais pas, Don.

translation.en: Maybe in a year or so. But probably not.
translation.fr: Peut-être dans un an. Mais sûrement pas.

translation.en: Sounds good. Just forget I even said anything about it.
translation.fr: Ça marche. Oublie ce que j'ai dit.

translation.en: Hey, look what I found.
Keep moving.
Be careful. You're gonna hurt yourself.
translation.fr: Attention. Tu vas te faire mal.

translation.en: I'm not. I'm trained for this. Greg set me up with parkour lessons.
translation.fr: Non. Je suis entraîné. Greg me paie des leçons de parkour.

translation.en: I thought you were taking karate. We agreed on karate.
translation.fr: On n'avait pas dit que tu ferais du karaté ?

translation.en: It was too hard, so I quit.
Well, it takes time to learn something, son.
You can't just go around quitting stuff 'cause it's hard.
translation.fr: Tu peux pas abandonner quand ça devient dur.

translation.en: That's not what Greg says.
translation.fr: C'est pas ce que dit Greg.

translation.en: Greg says if you don't like doing something,
translation.fr: Il dit que si ça te plaît pas,

translation.en: there ain't no reason to do it. And it's totally cool to quit.
translation.fr: ça sert à rien de continuer. Tu as le droit d'abandonner.

translation.en: Well, that's a terrible lesson. No wonder you got held back.
translation.fr: Affligeant comme leçon. Pas étonnant que t'aies redoublé.

translation.en: Greg says it was the teacher's fault.
translation.fr: Greg dit que c'est la faute du prof.

translation.en: Greg's only telling you what you wanna hear
translation.fr: Il te dit ce que tu veux entendre

translation.en: because he wants to suck up and not hurt your feelings.
Trust me when I tell you that when you get a little older,
you won't think gymnastics are cool anymore.
translation.fr: t'auras plus envie de faire de la gym.

translation.en: I told you, it's not gymnastics, it's parkour--
translation.fr: C'est pas de la gym, c'est du parkour...

translation.en: Oh, you're okay.
No, I'm not. My leg's getting ready to seize up on me.
translation.fr: Si. Ma jambe va me lâcher.

translation.en: That's why I told you stop playing around on the rocks. Get up.
translation.fr: Je t'avais dit de faire gaffe. Debout.

translation.en: Let me catch my breath for a second.
- Is your leg hurting or are you tired? - Both. Dang.
translation.fr: - T'as mal ou t'es fatigué ? - Les deux. Purée.

translation.en: Okay, we lost the whole morning already.
translation.fr: On a déjà perdu la matinée.

translation.en: - Daylight's burning here. - But, Dad, my leg's fixing to die.
translation.fr: - Faut pas traîner. - Papa, ma jambe va lâcher.

translation.en: Oh, you shit bird!
You all right, Don?
I slipped on this damn rock and hit my darn head.
translation.fr: J'ai glissé et je me suis cogné.

translation.en: Maybe it is a good time to stop for lunch.
Yeah, let's make camp. Sounds like a good idea.
Good, 'cause my blood sugar's running low.
translation.fr: Super, je commençais à manquer de sucre.

translation.en: Oh, shit, am I bleeding?
Hey, Jaden, where's your daddy?
- Making sandwiches. - You ain't hungry?
translation.fr: - Il fait des sandwiches. - T'as pas faim ?

translation.en: I am hungry. But I'm gonna put my hunger pangs into my music.
translation.fr: Si. Mais je vais en profiter pour faire de la musique.

translation.en: Oh, uh- oh. What's wrong?
I could tell you, but you would never understand.
Oh, you might be surprised what old Don understands.
translation.fr: Je comprends plein de trucs, figure-toi.

translation.en: - - You smoke?
Hell, yeah, I do. Don't tell your dad, though.
translation.fr: Un peu, mon neveu. Mais pas un mot à ton père.

translation.en: Thinks it scares away the deer.
translation.fr: Ça éloigne le cerf, je pense.

translation.en: Can I get a toke?
There you go, Biggin.
I wish my dad was more chill like you.
translation.fr: Si seulement mon père était aussi cool que toi.

translation.en: Your dad is definitely not the easiest fella to get along with.
translation.fr: Ton père n'est pas facile à vivre, c'est clair.

translation.en: He does put a lot of pressure on himself.
I think that's his drive to become the world's best hunter.
translation.fr: Il veut devenir le plus grand chasseur du monde.

translation.en: I can remember the first video I made with your dad.
translation.fr: Je me souviens de notre première vidéo.

translation.en: We were up in Michigan, and I was not prepared for the weather.
translation.fr: On était dans le Michigan, et j'étais pas paré pour la météo.

translation.en: That first day it had snowed ten inches and I'd forgotten my waterproof boots.
translation.fr: Il avait neigé 25 centimètres et j'avais zappé mes bottes d'hiver.

translation.en: I turned to your dad and said,
Please, Buck, let's turn back. Let's go home. Let's get out of here.
translation.fr: S'il te plaît, faisons demi-tour. Rentrons. Tirons-nous d'ici.

translation.en: But he wasn't hearing it.
He sat me down. He was like,
translation.fr: On s'est assis, et il m'a dit :

translation.en: Don, do you know what kind of pressure I'm under? Do you?
translation.fr: Don, tu sais la pression que je subis ?

translation.en: Every single person thinks
that Buck Ferguson gets his deer every single time,
and I won't turn back until I do.
- What'd you do? - What do you think I did?
translation.fr: - T'as fait quoi ? - À ton avis ?

translation.en: Sucked it up.
We stayed out there for another three days and damn if your dad wasn't right.
translation.fr: On a passé trois jours en forêt, et ton père avait raison.

translation.en: He caught himself a nice 12 pointer,
translation.fr: Il a tué un beau cerf à douze cors,

translation.en: and we made one of the best videos we've ever made.
translation.fr: et on a fait une de nos meilleures vidéos.

translation.en: What about your feet?
I lost my big toe to frostbite.
You lost a toe?
Yes, I did. Yep.
Got a little bit of a balance issue because of it.
translation.fr: J'ai perdu un peu le sens d'équilibre.

translation.en: That's not really the takeaway.
The point of the story is your dad is under a lot of pressure.
translation.fr: Sache que ton père subit une pression folle.

translation.en: You can understand being under pressure, right?
I guess.
Don, why does my dad hate me?
Hate you?
Oh, come on. You don't believe that.
translation.fr: Ne me dis pas que tu penses ça.

translation.en: Your dad is tough to get along with, but he loves you.
translation.fr: Il est certes pas facile à vivre, mais il t'aime.

translation.en: These last two years have just been tough on him.
translation.fr: Ces deux années ont été dures.

translation.en: That divorce did a real number on his head.
translation.fr: Le divorce lui a fait du mal.

translation.en: I think he believes this trip is gonna somehow fix it.
translation.fr: Il se dit que cette escapade va arranger les choses.

translation.en: Well, I wish he'd care less about me killing a deer
translation.fr: J'aimerais qu'il s'occupe moins du cerf

translation.en: and more about giving me back my dang phone.
translation.fr: et qu'il me rende mon téléphone.

translation.en: Caroline's probably worried sick.
I can relate to that.
If I don't call Kimberly every now and then,
she definitely puts my ass in the damn doghouse.
translation.fr: elle me fait dormir avec le chien.

translation.en: I wish there was some way I could let her know I'm okay.
translation.fr: J'aimerais pouvoir lui dire que tout va bien.

translation.en: That's all I want for her right now.
translation.fr: C'est tout ce que je demande.

translation.en: - You ready, buddy? - I'm ready.
- Are you filming? Is it rolling? - Yeah.
Here we go. Hoverboard city.
translation.fr: C'est parti. Je fais du skate.

translation.en: - Don't be scared. - I ain't scared.
translation.fr: - N'aie pas peur. - J'ai pas peur.

translation.en: Just don't wanna break my neck. Thanks for the ride, buddy!
translation.fr: Je veux pas me faire mal. Merci, mon grand !

translation.en: Hey, Buck, what you doing? What you up to?
Just looking for the shortest course to the top of this mountain.
translation.fr: Je cherche la voie la plus courte pour passer cette montagne.

translation.en: Oh, that's great.
Lunch is gonna get cold. Where's Jaden?
translation.fr: Ça va être froid. Où est Jaden ?

translation.en: Don, look at me. Where's my son?
translation.fr: Don, regarde-moi. Où est mon fils ?

translation.en: He's, uh, talking with his girlfriend.
No, he's not. I took his phone away.
I let him borrow mine. So he's...
translation.fr: Je lui ai prêté le mien. Donc...

translation.en: - You did what? - I let him borrow my phone.
translation.fr: - Pardon ? - Je lui ai prêté le mien.

translation.en: It was the right thing to do. He really wanted to speak with her.
translation.fr: J'avais pas le choix. Il voulait lui parler.

translation.en: I took that away from him so he'd focus on this trip.
translation.fr: Je ne voulais plus le voir distrait.

translation.en: How could you do that?
I guess I'm just a believer in true love.
translation.fr: Je crois encore à l'amour, on dirait.

translation.en: He is really torn up about this girl and I didn't think it was right--
translation.fr: Il a le béguin pour cette fille, et je ne pensais que...

translation.en: Don! Stop it! I'm his father.
translation.fr: Don ! Arrête ! Je suis son père.

translation.en: I know what's best for him, and I'd take it kindly
translation.fr: Je sais y faire, et tu seras gentil

translation.en: if you would not undercut my authority again.
translation.fr: de ne plus saper mon autorité.

translation.en: Copy that.
Nothing is going the way it's supposed to.
I cooked this nice meal.
The whole thing's gonna go to waste, just like this trip.
translation.fr: Ça va être du gâchis, comme cette virée.

translation.en: And now, I get to go be the bad guy again.
translation.fr: Et je vais encore devoir me payer le mauvais rôle.

translation.en: Thanks a lot, Don.
Jaden!
What did I tell you, son?
No phone calls until after this trip and you disobeyed me.
translation.fr: Pas de téléphone, et tu me désobéis.

translation.en: What do you have to say for yourself?
What do you have to say for yourself?
Caroline broke up with me.
What happened?
She went to this middle school dance,
translation.fr: Elle est allée à une boum,

translation.en: which everyone knows is a recipe for disaster.
translation.fr: et on sait tous que ça peut mener à la catastrophe.

translation.en: Now she says she doesn't want to date someone in elementary school.
translation.fr: Et là, elle me reproche d'être en primaire.

translation.en: That's ridiculous. You two are the same age.
translation.fr: C'est ridicule. Vous avez le même âge.

translation.en: That's what I told her.
Well, are you doing okay?
I'm fine. She's the one being stupid.
translation.fr: Oui. C'est elle qui est débile.

translation.en: She's being so dumb right now I can barely stand it.
translation.fr: Elle est tellement débile que ça me gave.

translation.en: I hate being in elementary school.
translation.fr: J'en ai marre d'être en primaire.

translation.en: Look, Jaden...
I know you like this girl, but let me tell you something.
translation.fr: je sais qu'elle te plaît, mais je vais te dire un truc.

translation.en: There is nothing wrong with you.
If Caroline or whatever her name is
translation.fr: Si Caroline, ou je sais pas quoi,

translation.en: can't appreciate you for who you are, then she does not deserve you.
translation.fr: ne t'apprécie pas pour ce que tu es, elle te mérite pas.

translation.en: Is that why you and Mom got a divorce?
Yeah. There were some other things.
It started in '09.
DVD sales were down slightly.
translation.fr: Les ventes DVD étaient en baisse.

translation.en: Your mom was proving through this whole thing
to be a terribly selfish woman.
She just had to give up her lavish lifestyle,
translation.fr: Elle a dû renoncer à son train de vie,

translation.en: trips to the mall, that sort of thing, and then she just went crazy.
translation.fr: à ses virées shopping, et elle a pété un câble.

translation.en: Just started acting out.
Around that time, Greg just kind of weaseled his way in
translation.fr: Greg a profité de cette mauvaise passe

translation.en: and basically stole my family out from me.
It's funny hearing both sides.
Why? How do you mean?
Mom said that you were always out hunting.
translation.fr: Maman te reprochait d'être jamais à la maison.

translation.en: And when you weren't hunting, you'd sit around drinking.
translation.fr: Et quand t'y étais, tu faisais que boire.

translation.en: Kinda checked out, like.
She said whenever she tried to discuss it,
you'd shut her down and leave her no choice but to leave.
translation.fr: tu te braquais, et elle en a eu marre.

translation.en: She said that?
She also said that it was the hardest thing she ever had to do.
translation.fr: C'est la décision la plus dure qu'elle ait jamais prise.

translation.en: You know why I love hunting?
Because when you're out in these woods, there's nothing to disturb you.
translation.fr: Quand on est en forêt, rien ne peut nous déranger.

translation.en: Back home, the outside world has a way of just barging in on your life
translation.fr: Alors que dans la vie normale, on est accablés de soucis

translation.en: and just screwing everything up.
It makes a man feel powerless.
But out here, all your cares just kind of melt away.
